title: Drawing, "Town on a Canal", 1750–70
medium: Graphite, pen and bistre ink, brush and bistre wash on cream paper
markings: Collector's stamp in blue ink: C. Rolas du Rosey (Lugt 2237)
inscribed: Inscribed in bistre ink, upper margin: 11.
description: A canal, spanned by two stone bridges, runs through a town. A thatched hut, left, and a stone building, surmounted by a town, right. Figures in the scene.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Town on a Canal", 1750–70.
1750–70. Graphite, pen and bistre ink, brush and bistre wash on cream paper. Gift of Milton Einstein. 1959-49-218.
